keys: Estudios empresariales. Información al consumidor. Notas
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4338</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Consumer Affairs Factsheet</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja informativa sobre información al consumidor</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Fírice faoi Ghnóthaí Tomhaltóra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbraucher-Angelegenheiten Checkliste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fiche de données d'Affaires du Consommateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Factsheet Dos Casos Do Consumidor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scheda Di Affari Del Consumatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενημερωτικό δελτίο καταναλωτικών υποθέσεων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Factsheet that looks at consumer affairs issues, together with relevant legislation in the area. Also mentions institutions like the Small Claims Court and the Ombudsman.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja informativa sobre información al consumidor, junto con legislación relevante en el área. También menciona instituciones como el Tribunal de asuntos menores y el Defensor del pueblo.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog fírice a fhéachann ar ghnóthaí tomhaltóra, mar aon le reachtaíocht chuí sa réimse. Labhrann sé freisin ar institiúidí ar nós Cúirt na nÉileamh Beag agus an tOmbusdman.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business Studies</string>
            <string language="es">Estudios empresariales. Información al consumidor. Notas</string>
            <string language="ga">Staidéar Gnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Consumer Education</string>
            <string language="ga">Oideachas Tomhaltóra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Notes</string>
            <string language="ga">Nótaí</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Checkliste, die Verbraucherangelegenheiten 
Ausgaben betrachtet, zusammen mit relevanter Gesetzgebung im Bereich. 
Erwähnt auch Anstalten wie das kleine Ansprüche Gericht und 
den Ombudsmann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fiche de données qui regarde des issues 
d'affaires du consommateur, ainsi que la législation appropriée dans
la zone. Mentionne en outre les établissements comme la petite 
cour de réclamations et le Ombudsman.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Factsheet que olha edições dos casos do 
consumidor, junto com a legislação relevante na área. 
Menciona também instituições como a corte pequena das 
reivindicações e o ombudsman.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scheda che guarda le edizioni di affari del 
consumatore, insieme a legislazione relativa nella zona. 
Egualmente accenna le istituzioni come la piccola corte di 
reclami ed il mediatore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενημερωτικό δελτίο που εξετάζει τα ζητήματα 
καταναλωτικών υποθέσεων, μαζί με τη σχετική νομοθεσία στην 
περιοχή. Επίσης αναφέρει τα όργανα όπως το μικρό 
δικαστήριο αξιώσεων και το Διαμεσολαβητή.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft Studien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbraucher-Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anmerkungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Études d'Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation du Consommateur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Notes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudos Do Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Do Consumidor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Notas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi Di Affari</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Del Consumatore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Note</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχειρησιακές μελέτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταναλωτική εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημειώσεις</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
